content:
I apologize for the mistake earlier. Let me check the schedule again.

It looks like I didn't schedule a yoga class on Tuesdays for you. If you're sure you have a yoga class on Tuesdays, could you please tell me what time it is? I'll make sure to add it to your schedule.

If you're still unsure, you can always check your recreation center's schedule or your personal calendar to confirm the time.
